description: University-league looks, best every-day sock dependability. The Oxford's stripes play well with everything from jeans to tweed blazers and sport the comfort of our lightest-wearing Merino Wool with a wash cycle-defying fit.
name: Darn Tough Socks Oxford Crew Lightweight Cushion Socks - Mens

specs.value: No slipping, no bunching, and no blisters
Unprecedented durability and their unique “put it on, forget it’s on” feel
Pulls moisture away from skin. Fast drying
Cool in the summer, warm in the winter
The ultimate fiber for breathability and comfort in all conditions
Undetectable seam fusion for an ultra smooth, invisible feel
